name: Circuit Circus
description:
Created for Wowie Jam 4.0:

https://itch.io/jam/wowie-jam-4

A Tower Defense game where you use cards to play the towers. But you don't have access to the mainframe, so instead an artificial intelligence embodied as a cute robot helps you place them. It isn't used to running around like this though, so it might need some help to stay in shape…
